channel.title: Declaring variables in Player.java [NEW]
channel.description:
I'm trying to add bank tabs of course :) and the tutorial im following for my 508 loading 525 cache & Roflpvp base is [url=http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/141497-508-99-banking.html]http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/141497-508-99-banking.html[/url] However the problem is, is when i compile i get these errors [code]Compiling net/com/Roflpvp/*.java .\net\com\RoflPvp\model\Player.java:1903: cannot find symbol symbol : variable size location: class net.com.RoflPvp.model.items.PlayerBank public int[] bankItems = new int[Engine.playerBank.size]; ^ .\net\com\RoflPvp\model\Player.java:1904: cannot find symbol symbol : variable size location: class net.com.RoflPvp.model.items.PlayerBank public int[] bankItemsN = new int[Engine.playerBank.size]; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If someone could help me find out whats wrong that would be great. Thanks :)

item.title: Declaring variables in Player.java [NEW]
item.dc:creator: @tarheels tarheels
item.description:
@tarheels wrote:

relmitos:

try size()

These are the new int’s(without any modifications)

public int[] bankItems = new int[Engine.playerBank.size()];
public int[] bankItemsN = new int[Engine.playerBank.size()];

But the size() is already there. Just within the brackets

Read full topic

item.title: Declaring variables in Player.java [NEW]
item.dc:creator: @tarheels tarheels
item.description:
@tarheels wrote:

Thank you guys for you’re responses. You’ve managed to take away 2 of my errors

Read full topic

item.title: Declaring variables in Player.java [NEW]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You already have bankItems and bankItemsN declared. So remove lines 1926 and 1927.
SIZE should be all lowercase.

Read full topic

item.title: Declaring variables in Player.java [NEW]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

take out public int[] bankItems = new int[500]; you already have that

declare SIZE.

Read full topic

item.title: Declaring variables in Player.java [NEW]
item.dc:creator: @tarheels tarheels
item.description:
@tarheels wrote:

I’m trying to add bank tabs of course and the tutorial im following for my 508 loading 525 cache & Roflpvp base is http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/141497-508-99-banking.html However the problem is, is when i compile i get these errors

Compiling net/com/Roflpvp/*.java .\net\com\RoflPvp\model\Player.java:1903: cannot find symbol symbol : variable size location: class net.com.RoflPvp.model.items.PlayerBank public int[] bankItems = new int[Engine.playerBank.size]; ^ .\net\com\RoflPvp\model\Player.java:1904: cannot find symbol symbol : variable size location: class net.com.RoflPvp.model.items.PlayerBank public int[] bankItemsN = new int[Engine.playerBank.size]; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

If someone could help me find out whats wrong that would be great. Thanks
